page.title: 15WHAT WE DO IN OUR SCHOOL
page.content: People go to School to learn things. At School we don't just work. We play games and do music, art and craft. We have play-time also. Sometimes, if we are naughty, we have to stay in at play-time. At our school, we arrive between 8.50 and 9.00 a.m. School starts at 9.00 and finishes at 3.30 p.m. At the end of the third year, when we come back to school after the Summer holiday, we go into Mr. Wills' class. Mrs. Melhuish teaches the first, second and third years and Mr. Wills teaches the fourth and fifth years. Mrs. Griffies comes to teach the fourth and fifth years on Wednesday and Friday mornings. Written by Stephen Low
